page.title: 17Fordingbridge - 1985.
page.content: Today Fordingbridge has good road connections (but no railway) and practically every family has one (if not two cars). These{changes in {mobility}have opened up greater {employment}opportunities. We did a survey of the occupation and place of work of the local inhabitants. A random sample of about one eighth of the adult population took part. Professional 28% Manual 20% Retired 20% Housewife 18% Clerical 10% Retail Trade 2% Unemployed 2% {Employed locally 58% Salisbury 15% Southampton 5% Other places e.g.London, Cardiff, Portsmouth etc. 22%
